casebody.data:
REGENCY CENTERS ACQUISITION, LLC
v.
CRESCENT ACQUISITIONS, LLC 134A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 12, 2018 Mark E. Anderson, Attorney at Law, Tracy S. DeMarco, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Regency Centers Acquisitions, LLC. Kiran H. Mehta, Attorney at Law, Sara S. Ash, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Crescent Acquisitions, LLC.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 11th of June 2018 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th of June 2018."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 13th day of July 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
